Title: Drink the Kool-Aid
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Adam Penn, Todd Kubrak (executive story editor), Joshua Green (story editor)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Cheyenne Jackson, Billie Lourd
Plot: Kai seeks to test the loyalty of his cult. Ally seeks revenge. Oz learns about his parentage.
